title: Le Souk
shortDescription: An e-commerce platform enabling users to browse and purchase products with a seamless shopping experience.
fullDescription: Developed 'Le Souk,' an e-commerce platform enabling users to browse and purchase products with a seamless shopping experience.
challenge: Creating a seamless and intuitive shopping experience for a diverse range of products.
solution: Built a responsive and fast e-commerce solution using modern web technologies.

title: 101-Leaders
shortDescription: Luxury magazine website, delivering engaging content focused on leadership and luxury topics.
fullDescription: Built the '101-Leaders' luxury magazine website, delivering engaging content focused on leadership and luxury topics with a user-friendly interface.
challenge: Presenting high-value content in an engaging and luxurious manner.
solution: Designed a sleek interface with focus on typography and reading experience.

title: Rose Smile
shortDescription: A specialized dental clinic platform in Makkah offering appointment booking and service browsing.
fullDescription: Developed a comprehensive digital presence for Rose Smile Dental Clinics, enabling patients to explore services, view doctor profiles, and book appointments online. Features include specific doctor filtering, service details, and current offers.
challenge: Providing an accessible and user-friendly interface for patients to access medical services and information.
solution: Built a responsive and fast React application with seamless navigation and appointment scheduling features.

title: BGL Pharma
shortDescription: Professional platform showcasing pharmaceutical products and services.
fullDescription: Developed the 'BGL Pharma' website, a professional platform showcasing pharmaceutical products and services, designed with a clean, user-friendly interface to enhance accessibility and drive engagement.
challenge: Presenting complex pharmaceutical information clearly and professionally.
solution: Structured content hierarchy and professional design system.

title: Facelog 2
shortDescription: Social media site supporting multiple images, rich text, likes, and comments.
fullDescription: A simple social media site where people can like, comment, and post. The site supports multiple images and rich text editing.
challenge: Handling real-time interactions and media storage.
solution: Utilized NestJs for backend logic and React for a dynamic frontend.

title: Safebites
shortDescription: E-commerce platform for food products tailored for special dietary needs.
fullDescription: An e-commerce platform focused on selling food products tailored for people with special dietary needs.
challenge: Filtering and managing specific dietary requirements for products.
solution: Custom filtering logic and clear product categorization.

title: InQorrect - Exam Platform
shortDescription: Quick exam-taking interface with real-time results and client-side anti-cheat measures.
fullDescription: A frontend-only, exam-taking page where people can pick and perform exams, then get results instantly with some anti-cheating measures on the frontend.
challenge: Implementing real-time results and anti-cheat measures.
solution: Built a responsive and fast React application with seamless navigation and appointment scheduling features.
